Container.Overview:
ReadingView is a self-hosted dashboard for visualizing audiobook listening statistics from Audiobookshelf.
Features: - Library view with bookshelf-style grid - Progress tracking for in-progress audiobooks - Statistics and visualizations - Direct Audiobookshelf API integration
After installation, access the dashboard at http://[IP]:[PORT:8501]
REQUIRED SETUP: 1. Enter your Audiobookshelf server URL 2. Generate an API token: Audiobookshelf Settings → Users → Your User → Generate API Token 3. Enter the API token in the configuration below

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface. Default is 8501.

Config.Name: Audiobookshelf URL
Config.Description: REQUIRED: URL of your Audiobookshelf server (e.g., https://audiobookshelf.example.com or http://192.168.1.100:13378). Do NOT include a trailing slash.

Config.Name: Audiobookshelf API Token
Config.Description: REQUIRED: API token from Audiobookshelf. Get this from: Audiobookshelf → Settings → Users → [Your User] → Generate API Token. Keep this secret!

Config.Name: Application Title
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Custom title for the dashboard. Default: ReadingView

Config.Name: Cache TTL (seconds)
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Cache duration in seconds. Lower = more up-to-date data, higher = less load on server. Default: 300 (5 minutes)

Config.Name: Items Per Row
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Number of audiobooks to display per row in the library grid. Adjust based on screen size. Default: 5

Config.Name: Theme
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: UI theme. Options: dark or light. Default: dark
